name: Cardboard People on Fire
description: See the cardboard city. See the people catch fire. Listen to the music of the city, or sit by the surf and let the waves wash over you. The flamed ones suffer when on the ground. Extinguish them with your hose if you want. If not they will ascend. You can't win. Any game you imagine is in your head. There is only one truth: cardboard people are on fire.
